summary: The Duke is wrongly convicted for a killing, but he escapes from prison and heads out west to find the real killer.
cast: John Wayne|Nancy Shubert|Lane Chandler|Yakima Canutt|Henry Hall|Hal Taliaferro|Art Mix|Bob Burns|Ted Adams|Silver Tip Baker|Hank Bell|Tommy Coats|William Dyer|Wally Howe|Jack Jones|Julie Kingdon|Tex Palmer|Tex Phelps|Hal Price|Archie Ricks|Robert Walker|Blackjack Ward|Slim Whitaker
keywords: wrongly accused|romantic rivalry|stagecoach robbery|country store|escaped convict
title: El camino de Sagebrush
